title: Fire-Boltt 360 Pro Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch
product_list_short_description: 1.32" Full Touch Retina Display with 360*360 Pixels Resolution
cat_seo_title: Fire-Boltt Smart Watch Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy Fire-Boltt Smart Watch at best price in Bangladesh. Latest Fire-Boltt Bluetooth calling Smart Watch available at Star Tech Shop. Order online to get delivery in BD.
product_page_short_description: 1.32" Full Touch Retina Display with 360*360 Pixels Resolution
full_description:
Fire-Boltt 360 Pro Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch

The Fire-Boltt 360 Pro is an affordable Bluetooth-calling smartwatch. It comes with a 1.32" Full Touch Retina Display with 360*360 Pixels Resolution. It features a Rolling UI and multiple watch faces. The Fire-Boltt 360 Pro supports TWS Pairing and it comes with an internal memory of 512MB that allows you to store all your favorite music right on your smartwatch. It comes with an inbuilt mic & speaker and supports Bluetooth Calling. You can directly answer and make calls using the dial pad on the smartwatch. The Fire-Boltt 360 Pro offers SpO2 Monitoring and Heart Rate Tracking to help you understand your health at all times. It offers Body Temperature Monitoring and Blood Pressure Monitoring. The smartwatch also has sleep monitoring, Meditative breathing, and Women's Health care support. The Fire-Boltt 360 Pro has a huge battery life that can sustain for 8 days in normal mode and around 30 days in standby mode. The Fire-Boltt 360 Pro also has an in-built gaming feature for your amusement. This smartwatch has IP68 water-resistant certification. The Fire-Boltt 360 Pro comes with a no warranty.

values.value: Typical Usage Time Without Calling 8 days
iOS 8.0 or above and Android 5.1 or above

product_page_short_description: 1.4inch HD TFT Screen With 240 x 240 Pixel Resolution
full_description:
Fire-Boltt Spin SpO2 Smart Watch

The Fire-Boltt Spin is a budget-friendly Bluetooth smartwatch. It has a 1.4-inch HD TFT screen and a complete metal body, so you'll be the center of attention. It monitors your oxygen levels and heart rate using SpO2 Monitoring and Continuous Heart Rate Tracking. The battery backup on this wristwatch is remarkable. It is powered by a lithium-ion battery. With a maximum usage duration of 5 days and a maximum standby time of 15 days. The seven sports modes accessible are walking, running, skipping, basketball, football, cycling, and badminton. It includes several watch faces. The Fire-Boltt Spin is a water-resistant watch with an IP67 rating, as well as scratch and dust resistance. A Smart Notifications system is included with this gadget. You may Stay Updated by Enabling All Notifications for Social Apps. Camera and music control via remote. The Fire-Boltt Spin Smart Watch comes with a no warranty.

values.value: Compatible OS: Android 5.0 or above, iOS 8.0 or Above
SpO2, Optical Heart Rate Sensor, Accelerometer, Barometer, Gyro Sensor, Light Sensor, Wrist Wake Sensor
